DOC.brief_summary: This study test whether vaccination viagenpumatucel-L combine low-dose cyclophosphamide prolong survival patient non-small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) fail 2 3 prior line therapy incurable metastatic disease compare chemotherapy alone . Patients randomize 2 1 viagenpumatucel-L arm chemotherapy alone arm , respectively .
